name: ssl-certs from devcontainer-essentials
description: Automatically install custom CA SSL certificates for corporate environments with proxy servers, firewalls, and SSL inspection. Supports .crt, .pem, .cer, and .p7b certificate formats with Java truststore and Node.js integration.

certsPath.description: Path to the certificates folder relative to workspace root (supports .crt, .pem, .cer, .p7b files)

updateCaBundle.description: Update the system CA bundle after installing certificates

trustJavaCerts.description: Add certificates to Java truststore (if Java is available)

trustNodeCerts.description: Configure Node.js to use system certificates

verboseLogging.description: Enable detailed logging during certificate installation for troubleshooting corporate network issues
